attributes.action: Make Travel a Tax Allowance Deduction
attributes.additional_details:
The Price of travailing to work is to high and is only getting higher.

To satisfy the working public we should be able to add the cost of travel as a tax free deduction from the tax free allowance, meaning that only tax will be paid on amount. I believe that this the best solution as the high demand of travel prices is making it hard for hard working people to travel to work. Please sign this partition to to allow the cost of session tickets be added to tax free allowances.
